entry.title: The source of truth
entry.content:
It’s a complicated world out there, especially on the Internet. Nobody knows who the authority is. Nobody knows who to trust. Where, oh where, can we look for answers to our questions??

Well, sorry to all the deities out there, but we have found our source of truth. It is the URL.

Competing sources of truth

Okay, so let’s say you’ve got an application that should show 2 different things to 2 types of people. (One group of people is ninjas. The other group is pirates. Obviously.)
